text: Hakare zupama vanoma hufina, rama'a hazenkefi ufrenoe, ti nehegefi tina marekanetogeno, kumzafa vahe'mo'za nahe'za nehazageno, nagrini'a naga'mo'zane, megi'a vahe'mo'za nahekate'naze. Rankumapima manige, ka'ma kokampina nevuge'za nazeri haviza hu'za nehazageno, hagerimpima fanane hu'za nehugeno, havige nerafu'zanena nazeri haviza hu'za hu'naze.
